reports.description: Loads all daily trial balance files for a month, consolidates data, extracts unique account combinations, and creates monthly tracking columns for comprehensive month-end reporting.

reports.name: Variance Analysis Report
reports.description: Analyzes variances between periods, identifies significant changes in account balances, and generates detailed variance reports with explanations and drill-down capabilities.

outputs.description: Validation report with debit/credit checks and reconciliation

requires: Trial Balance CSVs for selected period
